verses.name: Ephesians 4:24
verses.text: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:25
verses.text: Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:26
verses.text: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:

verses.name: Ephesians 4:27
verses.text: Neither give place to the devil.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:28
verses.text: Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with his hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.
